person.persName: John C. Betterworth (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Betterworth. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 26. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 6.
